alert.note: Alert for Goliad; Karnes (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 13 at 8:24PM CDT until May 16 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... Cibolo Creek Near Falls City affecting Karnes County. San Antonio River Near Elmendorf affecting Wilson and Bexar Counties. San Antonio River at Hwy 72 nr Runge affecting Karnes and Goliad Counties. San Antonio River near Floresville affecting Karnes and Wilson Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...San Antonio River at Hwy 72 nr Runge. * WHEN...Until early Tuesday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 33.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:15 PM CDT Saturday was 33.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 35.1 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage early Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 27.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 35.9 feet on 04/08/2023. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue San Antonio River Hwy 72 nr Runge 27.0 33.3 Sat 7 pm CDT 31.9 26.0 22.4 &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Sunday morning at 815 AM CDT.
